metalign.hierarchy.lpcfg

Class MetricalLpcfgGeneratorRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • metalign.hierarchy.lpcfg.MetricalLpcfgGeneratorRunner

  • public class MetricalLpcfgGeneratorRunner
extends java.lang.Object
    The MetricalGrammarGeneratorRunner class is used to interface with and run the MetricalLpcfgGenerator class.
    Author:
    Andrew McLeod - 29 February, 2016

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                        java.io.IOException
        The main method for generating an LPCFG grammar file.

        Usage: java -cp bin metalign.hierarchy.lpcfg.MetricalLpcfgGeneratorRunner [ARGS] input1 [input2...]

        Where each input is either a file or a directory. Each file listed as input, and each file beneath every directory listed as input (recursively) is read as input.

        ARGS:
        • -g FILE = Write the grammar out to the given FILE.
        • -v = Use verbose printing.
        • -T = Use tracks as correct voice (instead of channels) *Only used for MIDI files.
        • -l = Do NOT use lexicalisation.
        • -e = Extend each note within each voice to the next note's onset.
        • -m INT = Throw out notes whose length is shorter than INT microseconds, once extended.
        • -s INT = Use INT as the sub beat length.
        • -a FILE = Search recursively under the given FILE for anacrusis files.
        Parameters:
        args - The args as described above.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.io.IOException

      • generateGrammar

        private static MetricalLpcfgGenerator generateGrammar(java.util.List<java.io.File> midiFiles,
                                                      java.util.List<java.io.File> anacrusisFiles,
                                                      boolean useChannel)
                                               throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Generate a grammar from the given files with the given Runner.
        Parameters:
        midiFiles - The Files we want to generate a grammar from.
        anacrusisFiles - The anacrusis files for the given midiFiles.
        useChannel - True if to use channels as the gold standard voice in MIDI files. False for tracks.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - An interrupt occurred in GUI mode.

      • getAnacrusisLength

        public static int getAnacrusisLength(java.io.File testFile,
                                     java.util.List<java.io.File> anacrusisFiles)
        Get the anacrusis length for the given test file given the anacrusis files.
        Parameters:
        testFile - The file for which we want the anacrusis.
        anacrusisFiles - The anacrusisFiles.
        Returns:
        The anacrusis length for the given test file.

      • argumentError

        private static void argumentError(java.lang.String message)
        An argument error occurred. Print the usage help info to standard error, and then exit.

        NOTE: This method calls System.exit(1) and WILL NOT return.

        Parameters:
        message - The error message to print at the beginning of the exception.
